snippet: The company is also planning to review its cooking methods and maybe even get rid of some ingredients to change perceptions that it serves junk food.
lead_paragraph: The company is also planning to review its cooking methods and maybe even get rid of some ingredients to change perceptions that it serves junk food.

headline.main: McDonald’s to Reduce Number of Menu Items
headline.print_headline: Mcdonald’s To Reduce Number of Menu Items
